description: Applying Extreme programming principles while writing clean and maintainable code for a diverse array of clients.
Being a part of a dev team for an insurance company, building microservices using rust for the backend and elm for the frontend.
Working as a Full Stack developer and Frontend Lead in a small team that build from scratch a cloud native (aws) application for a big italian publishing company.
Maintained and developed code for in-house B2B software primarily using Java, Spring Boot and some VueJs sprinkled in.
Maintained code for in-house travel e-commerce using Java and Spring Boot
